segments.text: Oh I ’ m enjoying myself but it ’ s so hot here
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Isn ’ t London hot in the summer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well it can be but Shanghai is much warmer than London .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What about transport ? How does Shanghai compare to London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually I think the buses and trains here are more modern .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what about the number of people on the streets ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I think Shanghai is much more crowded than London .
segments.speaker: S2
